title: Cyberbully

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Cyberbully people at night, causing them to stop playing video games

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You can’t be killed because you lock yourself in your room all night
-Any investigative role will learn exactly what you are
-You learn the name of any investigative roles that visit you
-The player you cyberbully is mod killed and removed from the game
-Before the start of the game, you may cyberbully someone, forcing them to reroll into ritualist. They may not reroll out of the role

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cyberbully 4 players then have the town lose

desc:
Post 2704
_The internet covers my true identity so it’s ok to be an asshole_
